messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 157
messages.msgSnippet: Crystal Yes, I do think one of Jon s passions is fishing. We go together as a family. We travel all over our state. We have had many wonderful times together
messages.messageBody:
Crystal
Yes, I do think one of Jon's passions is fishing. We go together as a
family. We travel all over our state. We have had many wonderful times
together that way. Jon and I have a great relationship. He sometimes
takes his anger out on me because I am the safe one. Then we talk and
things calm down again. He knows I am there for him because that is the
way it has always been. I will talk to him about this too. See if he has
any interest in the history of fishing, etc. For the most part we
unschool. Although I still know in the back of my head I need to fit it
into the guidelines set by the state. I work around that. Michele



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
